body:
I did some tests when using this code as below, it does work. but can't obtain tfevent file. so confuzed!
cb=TensorBoard(log_dir='./mygraph',histogram_freq=1,write_graph=True,batch_size=BATCH_SIZE,
                                       write_grads=True,write_images=True)
callback=[] 
callback=callback.append(cb)
history=model.fit(train_x,train_y,
          batch_size=BATCH_SIZE,callbacks=callback,
          epochs=epochs, verbose=1, 
          validation_data=(test_x, test_y))
